page.title: 07LANIVET TRADE
page.content:
The Village Stores. This shop is a family run business the proprietors being Mr. and Mrs. Chambers. Mr. Chambers has a separate full time job so the running of the shop is controlled by Mrs. Chambers with assistants helping. The items sold range from fresh cakes, bread, rolls etc. to household cleaning materials, tin food and drinks.Daily papers can also be purchased.
The Forge. This establishment was first open to sell antiques and secondhand goods but the owner has gradually introduced food items and Cornish cream teas during the summer season. Fresh fruit and vegetables, and dairy produce are popular items for sale.
